Searching for Differences and Matches

When you have selected two files to compare and opened the Visual Diff window, you can find differences between the files and matching sections of the files by:

  • Scrolling through the file looking for changes in color, which indicate differences. Use the scroll bar to move forward or backward in both files.

  • Selecting Search > Next Difference or clicking the Next Difference button on the toolbar to move forward to the next difference.

  • Selecting Search > Previous Difference or clicking the Previous Difference button on the toolbar to move back to the previous difference.

  • Selecting Search > Next Match or clicking the Next Match button to move forward to the next matching block of text.

  • Selecting Search > Previous Match or clicking the Previous Match button to move back to the previous matching block of text.

  • (Cross-Platform client only) click the Differences Only button on the toolbar to display only the file differences. Matching text will not appear.
